name: National Speakers Assocation
who_you_serve: Professional speakers, authors, trainers, consultants, coaches, and podcasters
what_you_do: US-based professional association for public speakers, the oldest and largest of 13 international associations in the Global Speakers Federation, founded in 1973 Offers: Professional development for speakers, Online courses, Local and national mind-shares
offering: Professional development for speakers, Online courses, Local and national mind-shares, NSA Digital Vault (comprehensive knowledge and resources for professional speakers), Local Chapters, CSP/CPAE certifications and awards, Events (Thrive Winter Workshop, Influence Conference, Activate Online Conference, Youth Leadership Conference, CSP/CPAE Summit)
business_focus: US-based professional association for public speakers, the oldest and largest of 13 international associations in the Global Speakers Federation, founded in 1973 Offers: Professional development for speakers, Online courses, Local and national mind-shares
audience_type: Professional speakers, authors, trainers, consultants, coaches, and podcasters
